item.description: Bring your dogs (if they're friendly and you don't mind cleaning up after them)! Bring a basketball and shoot some hoops, or a frisbee or hackey-sack (is that what you call them?).  Bring a lawn chair.  Bring a softball & bat, or a guitar, flute, or tuba ;^) Bring a Scrabble board (or other board game) or a book. Bring something that can go on a grill (e.g., shish kebabs, corn on the cob, veggie burgers, or a dish made with whole, unprocessed foods (okay - OR a vegan dessert - I'm not going to say it has to be healthy ;^) Relax in the shade of the beautiful, towering pine trees.   Rain Date: Monday, July 4th (is this a holiday?). I'll clean off some grills the day before to ensure there are no residues of you-know-what on them. Louisa P.S. Bring some non-DEET bug spray! Pines Community Center is about half-way between Concord and Laconia: Exit 18 from 93.
item.name: Let's have a vegan barbecue/picnic at Pines Community Center in Northfield
